constituent: brain, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, owl, villain, sheaf, shovel
heisigStory: Part of the body . . . owl . . . villain. By way of exception, the kanji for brain has no connection with the primitive for brains.
koohiiStory1: The brain is the part of the body that can give you the wisdom of the owl... or the wickedness of the villain.
koohiiStory2: The brain is the part of the body that an owl will use to defeat the villain.
